description:
Teruya is on the move to stop Chika`s sniping. What will become of Kakizaki and Yuma`s one-on-one battle?
Meanwhile, Osamu faces off with the three members of the Katori Squad. Unable to gain control over the battle, Katori shows her anger toward Osamu.
The match approaches the final stage. Tamakoma-2 remains at an advantage, but can they keep it up and claim victory?
Source: crunchyroll
